titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: A bright rather cold day. I made such progress as I could with the lecture for Newcastle on "The Christian Doctrine of War".
in the afternoon. I attended Mattins & Evensong in the Cathedral. Jim arrived about 12 midnight: the train being very late.
